mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOMER_FAQ (QUESTION, ANSWER, FAQ_TYPE, HITS, DISPLAY_YN, DISPLAY_TOP_YN, REG_DT, MOD_DT) VALUES (#{question}, #{answer}, #{faqType}, 0, #{displayYn}, #{displayTopYn}, NOW(), NOW())
